records.name: Stun
descriptions: Display skills that inflict Stun on enemies.
Enemies can’t use any skill except Escape skills that allow them to break the Stunned state.

records.name: Daze
descriptions: Display skills that inflict Daze on enemies.
Enemies can’t use any skill except Escape skills that allow them to break the Daze state.

records.name: Knockdown
descriptions: Display skills that inflict Knockdown on enemies.
Enemies can’t use any skill except Escape skills that allows them to break the Knocked Down state.

records.name: Resist
descriptions: Display skills that can resist damage or status effects.
Some Boss enemy attacks will ignore resistance.

records.name: Defense
descriptions: Display skills that improve defense.
These skills repel enemy attacks or reduce damage received.

records.name: Escape
descriptions: Display skills that can remove paralyzing states.
Can remove paralyzing states such as Stun, Daze, Knockdown, and Unconscious.

records.name: Party
descriptions: Display skills that apply to party members.
These skills can improve the attacking ability of party members or protect them from enemy attacks.

records.name: Combo Skills
descriptions: Display Combo skills used in dungeons.

records.name: Target
descriptions: Display skills with Target effect.

records.name: Brand
descriptions: Display skills with Brand effect.
Leech can be used on the branded target.

records.name: Siphon
descriptions: Display skills with Siphon effect.
While Siphon is in effect, Wingstorm can be cast instantly.

records.name: Spectral Orb
descriptions: Display skills that create and consume Spectral Orbs.
